title: U&I Events and Hospitality presents Christmas with Bublé
desc: On Thursday 3rd December, we invite you to join us for an evening of festive entertainment at Fifty 9 Berkeley Square, as David Bradley is MICHAEL BUBL?!? David Bradley's Bubl? performance is Europes No.1 Tribute Show, and on the 3rd December, he will be singing all of our favourite Bubl? Christmas classics (as well as some of his album hits!). Early bird tickets cost ?29.99 per person. These include entry to the event, champagne & canapes, the Christmas Bubl? Tribute Show, and the opportunity to stay at the venue once the event ends. The price will go up closer to the event date so be sure to get your ticket as soon as possible! Doors open at 6pm, and guests will be welcomed with a complimentary champagne and canap? reception. The show will take place shortly after with a 20 minute break, and guests are invited to stay at the venue once the event finishes at 10pm. From 10pm onwards there will be a DJ, drinks, dancing, and plenty of festive fun!? Whether you fancy a festive night out with friends and/or family, or if you're planning a fun staff night out for you and your colleagues, then this is an event not to be missed.? For more information, please email concierge@uniqueinnovative.com? We look forward to seeing you there!
